commands./busy: Change to busy, anything after the command becomes your status
commands./brb: Change to busy with a message of "Be Right Back"
commands./me: Creates an action in the stream, "eg": /me waves
commands./status: Add a status message to let everyone know what you're up to
commands./mute: Mutes your audio when in a conversation
commands./invite: Sends an invite to the email address you type
commands./available: Change to available, anything after the command becomes your status
commands./unbusy: Removes busy status and message, setting you as available
commands./dnd: Changes to busy with a message of "Do Not Disturb"
commands./unmute: Unmutes your audio when in a conversation
commands./gif: Inserts a gif, type anything after the command to search
